duties_responsibilities.duty: Provision and manage underlying infrastructure on GCP, ensuring scalability and reliability of cloud resources.
Coordinate with vendors and manage the patching and maintenance of infrastructure to ensure robust and secure operations.
Manage and maintain Linux servers, ensuring high availability and performance.
Monitor the health of TAS and other tiles using tools like Grafana, and take necessary actions to optimize performance.
Oversee user and system credential management to ensure secure access and data protection.
Build and manage a robust service catalog to streamline internal processes and enhance operational efficiency.
Manage internal certification on Tanzu platform and ensure proper management of certificates for secure operations.
Utilize expertise in Concourse, Github, and Vault to optimize workflows and enable seamless development and deployment processes.
Facilitate communication and coordination across different enterprise teams while providing exceptional client support and service delivery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
